Yes, certain NVIDIA drivers had problems with releasing the memory.

body:
Yes, certain NVIDIA drivers had problems with releasing the memory.

On Fri, Mar 10, 2017 at 3:38 PM, Yaroslav Bulatov <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> @recursionbane <https://github.com/recursionbane> it's supposed to
> release it all, although on Linux I've seen cases that GPU was rendered
> unusable until restart, and this was caused by NVidia driver problems
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were assigned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/1727#issuecomment-285814765>,
> or mute the thread
